website_summaries.verdict: Performing like a pricier machine without skimping on build quality or features, Acer's 2019 Predator Helios 300 delivers excellent value. It's our new top pick among entry-level gaming laptops.
pros: Unbeatable gaming performance for the price
Seamlessly integrated component monitoring and boosting

customer_reviews.title: Options reversed
customer_reviews.text: Great laptop BUT the options for screen size and hardware are the other way round, changing screen size affects the specs you get and changing the specs affects the screen size.. I thought i was getting an rtx 2060 and a i7 9850h but i got the i5 9300h and 1660ti, still happy with it so I wont return.
customer_reviews.author: Diane Hamilton

customer_reviews.title: Very good value for money
customer_reviews.text: Came as advertised, positively surprised regarding parts that weren't specified, RAM- samsung dual channel 2x4GB 2667mhz ssd- NVMe WDC PC SN720 SDA 256GB hdd- st1000lm049 2gh172 1TB 7200rpm The only negative i can think of is that it's a bit loud in Turbo mode, but you can adjust fan speed to your liking
customer_reviews.author: Artur Wiszniewski

customer_reviews.title: Bought end of last year
customer_reviews.text: Amazing gaming laptop! Don't any complaints apart from the almost abysmal battery performance. Even doing none heavy tasks the battery doesn't last long. As a gaming laptop though you'll struggle to find a better one at this price point. Cooling is okay, could be better but the fans and heat sinks do a decent job.
customer_reviews.author: Dan

customer_reviews.title: Dissapointed in quality of supplier - supplying poor goods.
customer_reviews.text: The laptop was dispatched with quality seals tampered with - the sealed box had been opened but seals themselves split to make them look 'OK'. Unable to ascertain if the laptop had been tampered with and the disguised damage to the seals themselves suggests that something is not right. I returned immediately and highlighted poor quality to Amazon. Waiting for a refund. Pictures show a broken seal but in such a way to allow the original printed section to be 're-stuck'. The inner product box was similar. Very disappointed as the item was purchased as 'new'.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. D. M. Tindale

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommended
customer_reviews.text: Bought as a replacement gaming laptop for my son, excellent laptop, easy to set up, would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: John Elsey

customer_reviews.title: Battery life
customer_reviews.text: Generally a great laptop, graphics are excelent. The only thing is the battery life sofar topping out at 3 hours not even gaming so petty poor.
customer_reviews.author: Andy333

customer_reviews.title: Good laptop but with minor annoying issues
customer_reviews.text: This laptop is great for my gaming except for the low SSD. I've had no issues with my gameplay. The only problems I majorly have with this is the battery life and charging problems. It doesn't charge properly (as in it keeps going off as its charging or it just wont charge at all). Also I don't know about other but mine didn't come with a charger in the package so I've had to buy my own.
customer_reviews.author: Kyle Andrews

customer_reviews.title: A cool laptop finally
customer_reviews.text: It's a beast, and the 144hz, 17.3 display is amazing
customer_reviews.author: Alexandra

customer_reviews.title: Already getting old
customer_reviews.text: After 10 mths already issues with wifi, speakers and battery life. I had better expectations.
customer_reviews.author: Federico

customer_reviews.title: Predator Helios 300 i5 1660ti
customer_reviews.text: Great laptop for the price available Mid/Low Budget Gaming Laptop. Very pleased with the performance, will update
customer_reviews.author: Andrei Rares Dumitru

customer_reviews.title: Decent gaming laptop
customer_reviews.text: Value for money! Pretty decent battery quality for a gaming laptop. But you need some bisups to carry around, it will be heavy. And it heats up so much while running big games on hd.
customer_reviews.author: Charmzz

customer_reviews.title: The keys don’t work, don’t buy
customer_reviews.text: Having read a few troubleshooting forums this appears to be a common problem, don’t buy this laptop because some of the keys won’t work. The D Y and 4 keys didn’t work so we couldn’t set up the wifi as it contained these characters and there is no easy fix. Did the the resetting, removing battery and keyboard drives and none worked. Waste of £1500!
customer_reviews.author: Chris

product_meta.title: Acer Predator Helios 300 PH317-53 17.3-inch Gaming Laptop - (Intel Core i7-9750H, 8GB RAM, 256GB SSD and 1TB HDD, Nvidia GeForce RTX 2060, Full HD 144Hz Display, Windows 10, Black)
product_meta.description: Size Name:17.3| Style Name:Core i7, RTX 2060Ready for battle and eager for a fight, the Helios 300 drops you into the game with everything you need. Only now they have armed it with NVIDIA GeForce RTX graphics, the 9th Gen Intel Core Processors and the custom-engineered 4th Gen AeroBlade 3D Technology. Your gaming laptop’s style should match your own – with a look that says, “Start the match! I’m ready! ” So that when the black, metal-clad machine flares into life, filling the screen of the narrow-frame display with lurid colors, let it remind them that you know only one path: victory. Speed is at the core of this laptop with the display leading the charge. How? they have chosen a 144Hz IPS panel with a 3ms Overdrive response time. Farewell blur and hello clear, crisp, high-octane gameplay. Go on and hook up a few extra displays via the ports through HDMI 2. 0, DisplayPort 1. 4. Including the laptop screen, that’s a total of three displays to play around with. GeForce RTX gaming laptops are powered by the NVIDIA Turing GPU architecture and the ground-breaking NVIDIA RTX platform. Count on the fastest, most realistic, AI-enhanced gaming experiences. Add an extra layer of realism to your games. Ray tracing simulates the true behaviour of light to bring real-time, cinematic quality rendering to the most visually intense games. The revolutionary NVIDIA Turing architecture fuses together real-time ray tracing, artificial intelligence, and programmable shading for a whole new game experience. Programmable shaders defined modern graphics. Turing GPUs feature new advanced shading technologies that are more powerful, flexible, and efficient than ever before. All Predator laptops utilize the custom-engineered cooling technology. The latest generation’s new design reduces noise while increasing airflow – allowing you to maximize your performance no matter the task. Inspired by silent, powerful owl flight mechanics they gave the fans a serrated edge, allowing more air to pass through. Each of the 59 bionic blades is just 0. 1mm thick and all-metal with a stabilizing dual indent groove. Winglets along the top and bottom fan edge and a curved fin along the inner blade further reduce turbulence. The 4-zone RGB customized keyboard uses the own Predator typeface, has see-through concave-shaped keycaps for WASD and features two integral keys to take note of: Turbo and PredatorSense. Tap Turbo for instant overclocking or hit PredatorSense to open the utility app. Turn any pair of headphones into a high-end 360° surround sound system with Waves NX 3D Sound – enabling you to experience your favourite movies, music and games with real-world 3D sound. A suite composed of top of the line audio processing features to enhance every aspect of your laptop’s sound. Hear deeper thundering lows, even on small speakers. MaxxBass delivers the low frequency impact that makes music and gameplay come alive. Allows you to identify the “centre” (dialog) information and adjust its level independently, resulting in clear dialog that doesn’t vanish behind background sounds. No one wants to lose a match due to latency. It’s heart-breaking. With Killer’s E2500 Ethernet Controller, Wireless-AC 1550i and Killer Control Centre 2. 0, you have all the tools you need to clear out the online competition keep your ping low and 100% optimized.
feature_bullets: Ready for battle and eager for a fight, the Helios 300 drops you into the game with everything you need
They have armed it with NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1660Ti graphics, the 9th Gen Intel Core Processors and the custom-engineered 4th Gen AeroBlade 3D Technology
They have chosen a 144Hz IPS panel with a 3ms Overdrive response time, farewell blur and hello clear, crisp, high-octane gameplay
All Predator laptops utilize the custom-engineered cooling technology, the latest generation’s new design reduces noise while increasing airflow
The 4-zone RGB customized keyboard uses the own Predator typeface, has see-through concave-shaped keycaps for WASD and features two integral keys to take note of: Turbo and PredatorSense
